name: NINJA KATO 1
description:
【first In the Ninja kato Series!】

A 2D action game in the style of 1980s handheld games.
Control the robot ninja Kato and train him to become a full-fledged ninja.

There are a total of 4 stages given to Ninja Kato.
After clearing all stages, Kato will take on an even more difficult stage.

When all training is completed, Kato will make new history!

【STAGE 01】

Avoid the "kunai" and Get the Items!
The Time Limit Is 650 Seconds!
This is an exercise in quick thinking and good judgment.

【STAGE 02】

Memory Training!
Select the buttons in the order of the items displayed.

【STAGE 03】

Get Items Using "shuriken"!
The Time Limit Is 450 Seconds!
Birds Will Get In the Way Of Getting Items!

【STAGE 04】

Finally, Training With the Master!
Avoid the "kunai" fired by your master and get items!

【EXTRA STAGE】

This is an extra stage with increased difficulty!
